attributes.action: Change the Legal Driving age to 17.
attributes.additional_details: I am a 17 year old college student that needs to get a bus that is about 1 hour and 30 minutes there and back every day. so do a lot of other college students around me and in the UK. I believe you should be able to own and insure a Car at 17 to make our travelling to places of education a lot easier and I think people will agree.
attributes.background: I believe 17 year olds are mature enough to drive.Me being 17 i am mature enough to be driving on the road. It would make getting to college a lot easier for college students around the United Kingdom. Seen a petition to change it to 15 and I think that is just insane. 15 is too low. 17 is better

rejection.details:
You can learn to drive when you are 17:

https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive
